title: "Sherm Sticks 2 Bank Licks": The Antonio Vaughn Story
itunes:title: "Sherm Sticks 2 Bank Licks": The Antonio Vaughn Story
description:
In this episode of TGC, The homie Reggie Wright checks in and delivers a few messages to some lames, we then chronicle the story of Antonio Vaughn AKA Junior from Compton's Tree Top Piru. He tells the story of how he went from selling sticks to hitting bank licks and how that ultimately led to him spending all his 20's in the penitentiary. Press play to hear this explosive episode. Support the show. See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
